effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Power is doubled against Pokémon that have used minimize since entering the field.

short_effect.x_y: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

flavor_text.x_y: The user crushes its targets by rolling over them with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user crushes its targets by rolling over them with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.
